Package Model

Class NoteModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.NoteModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class NoteModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is the model for this project. It organizes every sub components in the model package and provides useful public methods for controller. It implements serializable just in case that this needs to notify view.
    Author:
    Jiacheng Yang
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  NoteModel.Functionality
      This enumeration has all features that is supported by this model.

    • Method Detail

      • addObserver

        public void addObserver​(java.util.Observer o)
        This method add a Observer to all shapes in its shapes list.
        Parameters:
        o - a Observer instance.

      • addShapeToCurrentPage

        public void addShapeToCurrentPage​(NoteShape noteShape)
        This method add a NoteShape to a list and assign observers to the NoteShape instance.
        Parameters:
        noteShape - a instance of NoteShape that has not been added into the shapes list.

      • deleteShapeFromCurrentPage

        public void deleteShapeFromCurrentPage​(NoteShape noteShape)
        This method remove a NoteShape to a list and assign observers to the NoteShape instance.
        Parameters:
        noteShape - a instance of NoteShape that has not been added into the shapes list.

      • getAllSections

        public java.util.Collection<NoteSection> getAllSections​()
        This method return a collection of existing NoteSections
        Returns:
        a collection of NoteSections

      • getCurrentNotePage

        private NotePage getCurrentNotePage​()
        This method gets pages object that is in current section and has the same id as currentPageId.
        Returns:
        a object of NotePage

      • getCurrentPageId

        public int getCurrentPageId​()
        This method is the getter for currentPageId
        Returns:
        a integer that is current page id

      • getCurrentSectionId

        public int getCurrentSectionId​()
        This method is the getter for currentSectionId
        Returns:
        a integer that is current section id

      • getNextSectionIdWithIncrement

        public int getNextSectionIdWithIncrement​()
        This is the getter for next section id. It automatically increments by 1
        Returns:
        a integer that is not used as id before

      • getObservers

        public java.util.List<java.util.Observer> getObservers​()
        This method returns all observers that has been added to this model.
        Returns:
        a list of observers

      • getPenSize

        public double getPenSize​()
        This method is the geteer for pen size
        Returns:
        a double that represents the size of pe

      • getSection

        public NoteSection getSection​(int id)
        This method finds section by id.
        Parameters:
        id - a integer
        Returns:
        a instance of NoteScetion.

      • getSectionMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,NoteSection> getSectionMap​()
        This method is the getter for section map
        Returns:
        a map whose key is integer and value is NoteSection object.

      • getShapesInCurrentPage

        public java.util.List<NoteShape> getShapesInCurrentPage​()
        This method get all shapes in current page.
        Returns:
        a list of NoteShapes.

      • removeSection

        public boolean removeSection​(int id)
        This method removes a section from the section map by its id
        Parameters:
        id - a integer
        Returns:
        a boolean that indicates if the id was in the map or not.

      • setCurrentPageId

        public void setCurrentPageId​(int id)
        This method is the setter for currentPageId. Un like setCurrentSectionId, this method does not checks if the currentPageId exists in the current section.
        Parameters:
        id - a integer

      • setCurrentSectionId

        public void setCurrentSectionId​(int id)
        This method is the setter for currentSectionId. This method checks if the corresponding sections exists in the map. If so, it sets currentSectionId and resets currentPageId. Otherwise, does nothing.
        Parameters:
        id - a integer

      • setNextSectionId

        public void setNextSectionId​(int nextSectionId)
        This method sets the next section id. This method should only be called when reading a saved object.
        Parameters:
        nextSectionId - a integer that has not been used as section id and is bigger than all existing sections' ids.

      • setPenSize

        public void setPenSize​(double s)
        This method is the setter for penSize
        Parameters:
        s - a double that represents the size of pe

      • setSectionMap

        public void setSectionMap​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,NoteSection> map)
        This method sets the map that is used for tracking sections. This method should only be called when reading a saved object.
        Parameters:
        map - a map whose key is integer and value is NoteSection object.
